overview: A Hui, who has eaten countless beautiful women, is troubled by the failure to meet a hundred percent girl. Kiki’s birthday, everyone made a birthday party for her. At the party, the three men issued a poisonous oath, and they would never have a heart for Aqi. One day, a one-hundred girl suddenly appeared. It turned out that she was Kiki’s cousin, Ma Yongwen. She also became A Hui's dream lover. However, she has lofty ideals, and soon she will go to study abroad, and the two will be difficult to leave. At this time, Yongwen told Ahui that Kiki had always been interested in him... On the other side, Ah Jian saw A Hui's feelings of sympathy, and he couldn't help himself. He was eager to have sex, but he had tasted the unprecedented sexual pleasure.
title: Sex 100%
